Welcome Home

We are Vision Community Global Ministries and our heart as a church is to be transformed and empowered to influence the world! Our church is filled with passionate people who love the Lord Jesus Christ and supports one another to become Christ-like disciples. As a growing global community of believers, we would love to get to know you more and bless you with the love of Christ!

We are looking forward to meeting you in one of our campuses!
